successes.title: Tex Murphy - Project Fedora
successes.description: Dystopian Detective Tex Murphy returns in his most amazing adventure yet in Project Fedora.

Pledges.description: Tex Murphy Wallpaper Pack

* Download of “Project Fedora” adventure game. (Available for your choice of PC and Mac. More platforms will be available if we exceed funding goal). 
* Exclusive membership to the official Big Finish Games Online Community. (Our online community will have behind the scenes updates, Sound Bytes, Music, Videos, ringtones, message boards and more. You'll also have the chance to communicate with the Big Finish creative team, participate in contests, win great prizes and more. Only available to you and other Big Finish Members.) ,and all previous reward tiers included.
Special "Tex Murphy's Mutant League, Crazy 888's Chapter" inspired tier! - Downloadable Blooper Reel from the 3 Previous Tex Murphy Games (Under a Killing Moon, The Pandora Directive and Overseer).

*Download of official HD "Project Fedora" poster.
*Download of "Project Fedora" Soundtrack (AAC or mp3 - DRM Free.)
*Download of “Project Fedora” Documentary.
* Previous Reward Tiers included.

* Download of Big Finish's Casual Games collectors edition Library, including: 
-3 Cards to Midnight, 3 Cards Dead Time, Escape from Thunder Island, Rita James and the Race to Shangri La.
* Previous Reward Tiers included.

*Credit to download your choice of one vintage "Tex Murphy" game from Good Old Games (www.gog.com) (PC only) 
*HD Digital Download of original "Under a Killing Moon", "The Pandora Directive" and "Overseer" Posters.
* Previous Reward Tiers included.

* "Project Fedora" Backer T-Shirt!                         
 * Digital Copy of original Tex Murphy movie "Plan 10 from Outer Space" (circa. 1989) with NEW Director and Cast Commentary! 
*  Previous Reward Tiers included. 
*  Add $15 for international Shipments.
Special "Tex Murphy's Mutant League, Crazy 888's Chapter" inspired tier! - Downloadable Audio book of Aaron Conner's "The Pandora Directive" novel, read by Chris Jones.

* Exclusive Boxed Collectors Edition of "Project Fedora"                 
* Your name featured in the "Special Thanks!” section of the credits.
* Special Edition "Project Fedora" Soundtrack on CD included. 
* NEW "Music of Tex Murphy" CD featuring live musicians playing classic Tex Murphy tunes!
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $15 for international Shipments.

ALL DIGITAL TIER! This tier is great for people outside the United States who do not want physical items shipped to them. Download of “Project Fedora” adventure game. (Available to you for PC and Mac. More platforms will be available if we exceed funding goal). * Exclusive membership to the official Big Finish Games Online Community. (Our online community will have behind the scenes updates, Sound Bytes, Music, Videos, ringtones, message boards and more. You'll also have the chance to communicate with the Big Finish creative team, participate in contests, win great prizes and more. Only available to you and other Big Finish Members.) * Credit to download ALL 5 vintage "Tex Murphy" games from Good Old Games (www.gog.com) 
* Downloadable PDF or eBook of Aaron Conners "Under a Killing Moon" novel with new forward by Chris Jones. 
* Downloadable PDF or eBook of Aaron Conners "The Pandora Directive" novel with new forward by Chris Jones.
* Additional DLC for “Project Fedora” featuring more game play, extra rooms, and 'Easter Egg' insights into Tex’s life and other citizens of Chandler Avenue.  
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $15 for international Shipments.

* Credit to download ALL 5 vintage "Tex Murphy" games from Good Old Games (www.gog.com) * Downloadable PDF or eBook of Aaron Conners "Under a Killing Moon" novel with new forward by Chris Jones. * Downloadable PDF or eBook of Aaron Conners "The Pandora Directive" novel with new forward by Chris Jones. * Tex Murphy Shot Glass * Previous Reward Tiers included. * Add $15 for international Shipments.

ALL DIGITAL TIER with six NEW episodes of "Tex Murphy Radio Theater."  This tier is great for people outside the United States who do not want physical items shipped to them. You'll also have the chance to communicate with the Big Finish creative team, participate in contests, win great prizes and more. Only available to you and other Big Finish Members.) Special "Tex Murphy's Mutant League, Crazy 888's Chapter" inspired tier! - Six NEW downloadable episodes of Tex Murphy Radio Theater!

* Beta Test the game.
* Autographed 24" X 36" Poster of "Project Fedora" from Chris Jones, Aaron Conners and others from the Big Finish development team.
* PDF of new Tex Murphy Comic Book.
* PDF of Aaron Conners' Story and Design Concepts  - Rare and collectible documents from the making of Under a Killing Moon, Pandora Directive, and Tex Murphy: Overseer.
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.

*Have your photo featured in the Tex Murphy game featuring Tex Voice Over commentary. 
* The Ultimate Detective box set of "Under a Killing Moon", "Pandora Directive", and "Overseer" in special edition Collector’s Box.
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.

* Official Autographed Tex Murphy Fedora
* Physical copy of Aaron Conners' "Under a Killing Moon" novel with new forward by Chris Jones. 
* Physical copy of Aaron Conners' "The Pandora Directive" novel with new forward by Chris Jones. 
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.

*Official Tex Murphy Zippo Lighter featuring traditional Tex Silhouette. 
*Physical Copy of new Tex Murphy comic book, autographed by artists. 
*Personalized "New San Francisco" Faux Driver's License. 
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.

* Upgraded to Jr. Producer in Credits. 
* Project Fedora "Director's Chair", imprinted with your name! 
* 20"X30" poster featuring a composited image of you w/ Tex Murphy in 2043 San Francisco. 
* Tex Murphy's, Louie's or Rook’s personalized message on your home or cell's answering machine!
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.

* Personal tour of the Big Finish Game Studio, and Lunch with Chris Jones. (Must be able to travel to Salt Lake City, UT) OR a One Hour Skype session with Chris Jones & Aaron Conners. 
* A 12" (That's inches!) Bronzed Statue of character from Tex Murphy game.
* Upgraded to Associate Producer in credits
* Personalized signed Collector's Edition of "Project Fedora" game box. 
* Previous Reward Tiers included. 
* Add $20 for international Shipments.
